LogicalSystem.details: I took the project for the final project activity in 2024 for grade 9 and successfully passed it
LogicalSystem.now: The project requires improvement on the optimization and engine side. At the moment the project is abandoned
LogicalSystem.about: In this game, you can create any electrical circuits. This game is Turing complete. I was able to create a full 8 bit gated adder in half an hour! The field of play is endless, there are many logical elements in the game, such as AND, XOR, OR, NOT and more.

ShopBot.details: The project was commissioned by an acquaintance and successfully delivered on time well ahead of schedule
ShopBot.now: The project is hosted on my infrastructure and also supported
ShopBot.hierarchy: Created a hierarchical database, with items that have a unique ID
ShopBot.about: The Telegram bot is divided into 2 parts: management, where all the controls are located, and client side, where the purchase interface is written

SolverBot.description: Bot, for solving variants from the Sdam GIA service
SolverBot.details: The project was completely invented and developed by me. I was able to bypass many of the site's defenses.
SolverBot.now: Waiting for the new school year 2024/2025
SolverBot.hierarchy: Created a database of all service tasks (More than 400k)
SolverBot.about: The bot receives all tasks from any variant (task list) on the service, and then sends back solutions and answers to all tasks

Hero.about: My name is Daniil. I'm a 16 year-old developer from Saint-Petersburg, Russia. Today, I work as a indie developer. And focusing on my own projects and POCs

Skills.hard-about: Levels of knowledge of Programming languages
